category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_manage_configurations_on_load_from_CATIA
preference.preference_description: Manage configurations on open BOM windows during the Load from CATIA or Update Status processes. Possible values: - YES: Use Configuration defined in the dat file if it exists; else if Client_0 is running, use the opened BOM window and its corresponding configurations; else create a new BOM window using default configurations. - YES_BLOCKER: When Client_0 is running, use Configuration defined in the dat file if it exists; else use the opened BOM window and its corresponding configurations; else stop the process. When Client_0 is no running, use Configuration defined in the dat file if it exists; else create a new BOM window using default configurations. - NO: Create a new BOM window using default configurations. - NO_CONFIG: Create a new BOM window without any configurations. - TC_CONFIG: Use the opened BOM window and its corresponding configurations; else use Configuration defined in the dat file if it exists; else create a new BOM window with default configurations.
